resources.string: "Don't waste time synthesizing. PLAUD generates key insights from transcripts."
The plan will take effect right after redemption is activated, which may supersede any remaining unused free trial minutes.
Addition of 120 minutes of transcription time

After enabling Automatic Call Recording, the PLAUD app needs to keep running in the background so that it can automatically start the device recording when there is a call. Therefore, you need to allow the PLAUD app to access the location information \"While Using the App\".
The app will only automatically upload local audio files to the cloud when the phone is connected to Wi-Fi.
After enabling the automatic cloud backup feature, all files from local applications will be automatically uploaded to the cloud.

After completing this transcription, your remaining transcription time for this month is estimated to be less than 60 minutes. To avoid any disruption to your future transcription needs, we recommend purchasing extra time package to obtain more transcription minutes.

"After the account is canceled, we will delete all personal data in your account and the recording files stored in the cloud, and you need to re-register to use the APP again.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or related matters, please email us at support@plaud.ai."
All recordings in PLAUD CLOUD have been deleted
Recordings have been deleted from PLAUD CLOUD and any PLAUD APP syncing recordings with PLAUD CLOUD. Synchronization has been stopped.
All recordings in PLAUD CLOUD will be deleted
Recordings will be permanently deleted from PLAUD CLOUD and any other PLAUD APPs syncing recordings with PLAUD CLOUD.
Allow PLAUD to Join Wi-Fi Network
Device connection failed, please check the device and network, or directly contact online customer service

For web version, open " in the computer browser http://PLAUD.com "
· Edit and view. you can view the audio synchronized to the cloud, listen back and edit. · Download Audio. It supports downloading audio files directly on the web.
open " in the computer browser http://PLAUD.com
Non-repeat": Scheduled recording starts only once at %1$s "
Daily": Scheduled recording repeats every day at %1$s "
After the firmware transfer is complete, the device will automatically upgrade when charged to more than 30%. Please do not unplug the charging cable or toggle the device switch during this period!

"Firmware is currently updating. After a successful update, it will automatically restart. Please wait for approximately 1 minute and avoid disconnecting the PLAUD NOTE's charging cable or pressing any of its buttons."
Weekly: Scheduled recording repeats every week at %1$s

“AI Omnidirectional Noise Reduction": Omnidirectional pickup, AI noise reduction; single-channel recording, sampling rate 16KHz, bit rate 256Kbps. Audio files are small. Use in noisy environments.
"Original sound recording": real sound quality, no noise reduction; single-channel recording, sampling rate 16KHz, bit rate 256Kbps. Audio files are smaller.
"Stereo music: real sound quality, no noise reduction; dual-channel recording, sampling rate 48KHz, bit rate 1536Kbps. The audio file is large, and real-time transmission cannot be realized during online recording.

“Meeting": The recording file is saved in the ”MEETING“ folder of the U disk.
"Classroom": The recording files are saved in the ”CLASSROOM“ folder of the U disk.
"Interview": The recording file is saved in the ”INTERVIEW“ folder of the U disk.
"Music": Stereo music, recording files are saved in the ”MUSIC“ folder of the U disk.
"Memo (default): The recording file is saved in the ”RECORD“ folder of the U disk.
It can be recorded up to %1$s minutes
The maximum recording time is %1$s hours and %2$s minutes
Please check whether the device is in Wi-Fi transmission mode. If the device is normal, please try again. If the retry fails, please contact online customer service
%1$d device recording files left are synchronizing
1$d device recording files left are uploading
It is uploading the file to Cloud (%1$d/%2$d)

Any actions you perform on files within the app locally, including adding, deleting, modifying file information such as file names, tags, keywords, transcriptions, summaries, etc., will automatically sync to the cloud. This ensures that you can effortlessly restore this data whenever you get a new device.
Are you sure you want to delete this tag? After deletion, all files with this tag will automatically have the tag removed.
Are you sure to delete this keyword?
Are you sure you want to erase all files on the device? Once erased, the files cannot be recovered.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete all files in the Trash? This action cannot be undone.
Follow along effortlessly. Listen and scroll through a transcript that highlights each recorded content.

Voice-activated recording can automatically filter out silence and very faint sounds in the environment, effectively reducing the size of the recording files. It improves the audibility of the recordings and makes subsequent data transcription more convenient and accurate.
"Automatically sync your recordings to PLAUD CLOUD, so you'll be able to playback, manage, share from any of your PLAUD APPs and PLAUD WEB(app.plaud.ai)."
Balancing quality and missed human voice detection.
Choose a plan and get productive
The cleaning process was interrupted or encountered an exception. Please try again later.

Create more, share more, save more.

After enabling the local transcription service, the built-in AI transcription model of the app will automatically transcribe the first 10 minutes of the audio file for free.

Save time juggling notes, PLAUD flawlessly transcribes audio from meetings, calls, interviews, and lectures.

The device must be in charging mode (non-USB mode) to perform the upgrade.

In queue, will start automatically after other files.

"Microphone gain refers to the degree of amplification of the signal during the process of converting sound waves into electrical signals. Excessive gain can cause distortion, noise or echo, while insufficient gain may result in weak recording that is difficult to hear. The microphone gain setting range is 0-30dB."

Microphone gain refers to the degree of amplification of the signal during the process of converting sound waves into electrical signals. Excessive gain can cause distortion, noise or echo, while insufficient gain may result in weak recording that is difficult to hear. Setting range: 0-30dB
See, not just read—PLAUD generates mind maps from summaries, allowing you to digest insights visually.
Mind-map is auto-generated based on Summary
Transcription quota is now added to your account.We appreciate you turning to us for your growing transcription needs.
PLAUD extracts key highlights, topics, and action items from your meetings, calls, interviews, and lectures, ensuring you capture every essential detail.

"V.C.S. stands for Vibration Conduction Sensor. By attaching the device to the back of a mobile phone, V.C.S. can sense the sound from the phone's internal earpiece during a call. The greater the gain of V.C.S., the higher the amplification level of the sound signal, resulting in a louder recorded voice of the other party in the conversation."

"We are committed to protecting the personal information you provide when using our APP, and we follow laws and regulations in collecting, using, storing and transmitting personal information, and follow privacy protection principles to protect your information. Personal information is all kinds of information related to identified or identifiable natural persons recorded by electronic or other means, excluding information after anonymization processing. On this APP, we may collect the following personal information, including nickname, region, email address, device SN, as well as login events, page interaction events, page stay time, and other information obtained for analysis and statistics to be used for future user experience upgrades."
"We're sorry. Summarization has failed. You can:"

Your purchase has been successfully restored and is now accessible in your account. We appreciate your patience during the process. Enjoy!

"Nicebuild was created by a group of talented engineers and is committed to creating a leading global AI audio hardware brand. The company has launched the PLAUD NOTE AI Voice Recorder and iZYREC Smart Mini Recorder, starting with the AI recording pen product line. Both products have achieved excellent results on global technology product crowdfunding platforms, with cumulative sales of millions of dollars and products sold to hundreds of countries and regions worldwide. We have also achieved significant results in retail channels, ranking first in categories on multiple platforms such as Amazon and continuing to grow. The company will further develop innovative audio hardware products with AI innovation as the core, so stay tuned for PLAUD's new products with ultimate music aesthetics and AI microphone capabilities."
PLAUD needs to use your location permission to add the location information of the recording file
Please allow the following permissions in the settings:
PLAUD needs to use your microphone permission to speak
PLAUD needs to use your camera permission to take pictures
PLAUD needs to use your location permissions to search for nearby Wi-Fi
PLAUD needs to use your storage space permissions to access the contents of the album
PLAUD needs to use the following permissions to search for nearby Bluetooth devices:
Transcriptions and summaries will match your selected language.
To send attachments you need to allow permissions in your settings

After account cancellation, it will not be possible to log in using the original account and password. To use the PLAUD app again, you will need to register again.

After the account is canceled, all data and files (including cloud files) under the account will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Therefore, please make sure to backup any important files before proceeding;
Please confirm whether there are still devices under the account that have not been unbound. If so, please unbind them first, otherwise the account cannot be canceled;
Please verify the account first (it cannot be retrieved after canceling the account, please operate with caution)
Thank you for your use and look forward to your return.

"1. Please check whether the recorder is turned on. If it cannot be turned on, please charge it for more than 10 minutes.
2. If the recorder is turned on, please confirm whether the device is bound to other accounts. If it has been bound to other accounts, it needs tobe unbound before it can be searched by the current account.
3. If it is still not resolved, please contact us in customer support in the App and we will reply as soon as possible."

"1. check if the device is turned on: Click the device button and observe if the device indicator light turns on. If the indicator light doesn't turn on, please charge it for at least 10 minutes.
2. If the device is turned on, please confirm if it is currently connected to another account. If the device is connected to another account, its SN cannot be found by another account.
3. If the issue persists, you can click on the customer service icon at the top right corner of the PLAUD app homepage to contact online customer service. We will reply as soon as possible."

"AI Noice Cancelling: Omnidirectional pickup, AI Noice Cancelling; single-channel recording, sampling rate 16KHz, bit rate 256Kbps. Audio files are smaller. Used in mixed environments. Original Sound Recording: real sound quality, no noise reduction; single-channel recording, sampling rate 16KHz, bit rate 256Kbps. Audio files are smaller. Stereo music: real sound quality, no noise reduction; dual-channel recording, sampling rate 48KHz, bit rate 1536Kbps. Audio files are larger."

"Meeting: Recording files are saved in the “MEETING” folder of the U disk. Classroom: Recording files are saved in the “CLASSROOM” folder of the U disk. Firmware is updating,keep connecting device to bluetooth

Update failed,please check the network,or contact our online customer service

"Insufficient device space. Please upload your recording files to the PLAUD app in a timely manner or access your device's USB drive to clean up unnecessary files, ensuring that the device can record properly."

Client error. Not classify or do not want to provide specific error
It has already existed in the database. Uniqueness verification failed
It does not exist in the database, such as: the object to be modified does not exist, and the user logged in does not exist
Token is occupied and there are other places to log in
The verification code has expired, or there is no application at all
The transmission of verification code is limited to 10 times every 5 minutes
Operation succeeded without any additional information
Return succeeded. The requested operation is unnecessary. The state of the request target is already the state expected by the request

Failed to start recording, the device is currently busy.

Simultaneously delete files from the cloud and the App

Do you need to synchronize the latest device audio files?
Currently in the Wi-Fi fast transfer, please try again after the end.
Simultaneously delete files from the device and the App

File sync is complete, ready to turn off Wi-Fi fast transfer mode and connect your device to Bluetooth.

Device recording file sync is paused
Is synchronization of recording file too slow?
Rename failed, server error and please try again
The device has entered U-disk mode. The connection between the PLAUD app and the device will be disconnected in 3 seconds.

There is no device connection at present. Please connect or bind the device first.
